short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you of new items on your watchlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension for obsessively monitoring your wiki watchlist. It will tell you the number of new items on your watchlist, including popup notification. You must enter your username and watchlist token to log in.

Based on https://github.com/knyar/theoldreader-chrome
